verses.name: Genesis 11:7
verses.text: Go to, let us go down, and there confound their language, that they may not understand one another’s speech.

verses.name: Genesis 11:8
verses.text: So the Lord scattered them abroad from thence upon the face of all the earth: and they left off to build the city.

verses.name: Genesis 11:9
verses.text: Therefore is the name of it called Babel; because the Lord did there confound the language of all the earth: and from thence did the Lord scatter them abroad upon the face of all the earth.

verses.name: Genesis 11:10
verses.text: These are the generations of Shem: Shem was an hundred years old, and begat Arphaxad two years after the flood:
